say.text: Oh, I didn't see you there!
We really gotta get a move on...
Roz, where have you been did you get seperated?
Huh? Sorry I... uh? must have... Wait! Who are you?
Don't tell me you can't remember, it's me! We went through a portal and found ourselves stuck in this place.
No good, The Morrigan must of cast a spell on her. Poor lass - Can't recall a thing. It's not safe here for the two of you.
We my dear, are heading up the mountain to meet the Great Academic. If he doesn't know how to get you two home nobody will!
She's the ruler of this land. Let's just say it would be bad if we ran into her.
So far, I don't think she knows you are here, but if she found out a human, two humans no less... Well, we need to get you both outta here.

option.text: What do you mean it isn't safe?

say.text: It wasn't always this ways you know. There was a time when the creatures of the valley and us Hobgoblins - and Humans too, could all live in harmony.
But now with The Morrigan in power. The valley can be a dangerous place.

option.text: Do you all have blue skin and green hair?

say.text: Do you all have red hair, freckles and pasty skin? Humans, think we all look alike they do.
We need to head north. There's a cave up thatta ways which will lead us to the Great Academic.
